Text: I haven't actually downloaded this torrent, but you're doing a great job bringing books to the masses. I'm usually reasonably good at tracking down ebooks (and converting them if necessary), but I've not had any luck with My Name Escapes Me, or any of Alec Guinness' books for that matter. If you have them I'd be most appreciative.
